resources.string: I will remind you to have a drink every 2 hours.\n\nSimple as that.
When the notification appears (in 2 hours), click "Later!" to get another notification in 15 minutes. A one time advertisement will now be shown.

string-array.name: notification_messages
string-array.item: Yo! Have a drink right now!
Drink some water! Or juice. Whatever.
Have a glass of water, please.
Have you had your dose of water yet?
Get a glass of water right now!
